choices: Stay there and wait for something
1.content:
You decide that you will take a walk to...take your mind off of some things for a bit. As you are walking down the street you live on, you start to feel sick. You walk it off for a bit, but the feeling comes back. It gets so bad that you black out.

You wake up and adjust to the light. When you do that, you stare in shock at how BIG everything is. You must be only half an inch tall! You start to get a little terrified. What if no one finds you? That's when you realize that you are standing near the house that some guy recently just moved into. He seemd like, 20-25 years old, and seemed nice enough. Maybe you should go to his house?
1.title: Shrunk

choices: Wait until he opens the door
11.content: You decide that you will go to the new guy's house. You walk up there for what seemed like hours, until you finally reached the door. You climb up on the little step there, and is faced with a new problem. How do you get into the house?
11.title: New Guy

choices: Stay and wait for the guy
111.content:
You wait for like, 5 minutes, before the door opens quickly. You stand and look up at the guy. He was about 5'11", short brown hair, a little facial hair, wearing shorts, a regular t-shirt, and flip flops. You get out of the way as he walks out the door, and quickly run into the house. You look around. He really seemed to feel at home here, seeing as everything was put away.

You walk into his living room, wondering where he went, and then you sit down by the coffee table. You seemed to make yourself at home too, even though your home is down the street.

Now what?
111.title: In the house

choices: Climb his foot, hoping he'll see you
1112.content:
You sit down near the foot of the couch, and lie there. You woke up early and you needed some rest. You close your eyes and drift off to sleep...

*******************************************************

You wake up to an unearthly sound. You sit up quickly and remembered what happened to you. You get up run to your left. Before you even get anywhere, you bump into something. You fall down and realize, you just hit the new guy's foot. He bends down to scratch his foot, thinking you were a bug.

What do you do?
1112.title: Rude Awakening

choices: In the kitchen- everyone has to eat after a run
In the bathroom- Everyone has to shower after a run
112.content:
You lay down on your side and shuffle slowly along the ground towards the door. Sure enough you are able to move underneath it.

Once inside the house you spin around, admiring the size of the place. Everything is unbelievably massive, the kitchen, the furniture, heck even the floorboards are impressive.

Now if you were to get the giants attention, where would you go?
112.title: Destination

choices: He is taking his shoes off
1121.content:
Your little feet pound over the floorboards, careful not to fall down any cracks. You reach the bottom of the counter in the stylish kitchen. He sure keeps clean in here.

To your right you see a telephone cord, this may be the ticket to reach the top. An athlete in gym class, you always showed your skills on the rope climb. You charged up the telephone cord at a breakneck speed.

You finally reach the counter top and collapse in relief. From here he will surely be able to see you.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------
After about an hour, a deafening crack rips through the silence as the giant opens his door. He stands there in his tight grey shirt and tiny dark blue shorts. Sweat is dripping off him in torrents. His armpits have a thick, dark film of sweat stains, his gorgeous dark skin glistens.

As he walks over to the counter, he gives his enormous groin a scratch, completely unaware of the tiny visitor. He towers above you, you could swear he was looking right at you...alas he was reaching for his mail behind you. As he stands above you, reading it,he towers at such a height that his mammoth, sweaty groin is at eye level with you.

He checks the oven to make sure his dinner is cooking, without taking his eyes off the wad of letters that had been sent to him. You edge closer to the giant, the smell of his groin is strong through the tiny shorts. His legs burst from the openings like dark monoliths. As you reach him however he turns around, resting his firm yet plump ass on the counter. The smell of 22 year old ass is intoxicating.

You run your hands along the firm ass, bound tightly behind the sweaty workout shorts. The fat and muscle react, twitching to your touch. His massive hand comes around. You are lucky enough to spot it from the corner of your eye. You jump back as the fingers dig into the sweaty crack. The nails scratch along the material as the mass behind it move fluidly.

The giant man is unable to satisfy his itch, so the massive hand descends under the fabric of the shorts. As he scratches, the smell that wafts out is of sweat, shit and man. An intoxicating scent for your tiny nostrils. As the hand retreats from the glutes, the tiny shorts now ride low, revealing to you this giant has no tan line.

As the giant bends over to check his meal, he catches a waft of his body odour through his underarms. He raises his right arm up, displaying his massive bicep, inhaling the sweaty scent. Both arms return to the bottom of the shirt, as if like a calvin klein ad, he peels the wet shirt off his body, revealing his massive torso. It is his kitchen, why not be comfortable. Now he is facing you, you watch as a bead of sweat drops from his hair. It runs down the slight stubble and onto the firm,broad chest. it passes the massive nipple as it descends off the amazing pectoral. The pace of it quickens as it rushes along his abs, across the V-line of his hips and into the tiny patch of pubic forest that pokes above his now-low riding shorts.

He rests one hand ontop of the table. You crawl upon the fingertip unnoticed. The detail of the skin is amazing at the size and the smell is indicative that this is the hand he used to scratch himself. With a breakneck speed the hand begins to move.
1121.title: Can't Stand the Heat?

11211.content:
You drop off into the oily forest. Hairs around you shoot out like skyscrapers. The sweat continues to pump out of the giant man, creating a slick surface on which you try to maintain footing.

You can feel the giant moving about beneath you. You journey through his hair undetected. His scent is now familar to you as you breath it in constantly in this humid environment. After a long period of time, a pool-sized drop of water crashes down onto you. Sure enough another follows at incredible speed. The ground beneath becomes harder to grip on to. You reach out for any holding, but find yourself slipping around. Finally one hair provides a grip for you.

You arch your neck to see a moon-sized silver object as the source of the water. The giant is taking a shower. A tidal wave of cold, pink liquid flows over you. Two mammoth hands come into view. As the hands massage the pink ocean,tossing you about, your landscape begins to foam up. Torrents of water return as the hands continue their massage.

You are pushed by the dirty fingers off the scalp. With a sickening thud you land on a hard surface. Looking around, you see the giant is still unaware of you and you have indeed landed on
11211.title: Rain

11212.content:
The hand begins to move down. The giant swings an immense left leg over his right. The other hand joins, and they slowly peel off the giant silver and white Nike Shox. You enjoy the excellent view from your position on the man's wrist. You are so tiny that he doesn't feel your presence there.

He lets his shoe dangle, fall off, then hit the floor. His hands move in and begin to massage his foot, and you still stand on his wrist. At your size, you enjoy a very detailed point of view. You can see all the teeny, tiny square patterns covering the whole white, sweaty sock that his foot lay inside, colored dark in some places by sweat. You can smell the odor of a very tired and sweat-loaded foot as the massive hands move all over his sole and toes.

His hand then travels toward the edge of the sock, just above his ankle, he gradually removed the sock from his foot, and tossed it to the ground. His gargantuan bare foot is now revealed. A bare sole a little brighter than the rest of his skin is wrinkled greatly by all the running he did previously. The sweaty scent is stronger now; the moisture of his sole is visible. He wiggles his huge toes, letting free more odor. He repeats with his right foot, and you enjoy another foot experience.

After massaging both feet, he
11212.title: Taking His Shoes Off

112121.content:
You hold on and try to keep your balance as the giant dude you have never met before relaxes and watches some TV. You watched the television as well, but you couldn't really tell what they were saying. Before long, you look up at the giant and he was sleeping! This could be a good chance to get his attention!

Or...do you want have some fun first?
112121.title: Takes a nap

choices: Your father. He is sleeping, right?
Go back to the new guys place
13.content: You decide that you be going to wall home. You only live with your dad and your older brother, so one of them should help you. You make your way to your place. You can see the house from your viewpoint. Your father, Don, is sitting in a lawnchair, snoring away, and your older brother, Rick, is playing basketball with his friend, Chris. Who should you pursue?
13.title: Walk home

info.brief_description: Your taking a walk when you suddenly shrink! You need help!
info.description:
Your taking a walk one day down your street. All of a sudden, you feel sick, and black out. When you wake up, you shrunk to half an inch! You look around and notice your in front of a house. Some guy just moved there. You decided to go their because its closest, and because he seemed nice when he moved in.

Rules:
1) Make sure that you only interact with this one guy in this house(you can pick his name).
2) No female interaction. There may be some, but don't let the shrunken character interact with her.
3) Make sure you keep unnnoticed. And if he is, make sure that the guy thinks he's a bug or something.
4) Anything goes here, so go nuts.
5) Have Fun...!
